game

Class Pool

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Pool

  • public class Pool
extends java.lang.Object
    The Pool holds 100 tiles initially, and players refill their frames by drawing tiles at random from the Pool.
    Author:
    Rajit Banerjee, 18202817, Tee Chee Guan, 18202044, Katarina Cvetkovic, 18347921 Team 15: DarkMode

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Pool()
      Creates a new pool of tiles.

              throws java.util.NoSuchElementException
        Draw a tile at random from the pool.
        Returns:
        the randomly drawn Tile object
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - if player tries to draw Tile from empty Pool

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Checks if the pool is empty.
        Returns:
